movies.cast: Ajay, Allu Arjun , Anasuya Bharadwaj
movies.description: Pushpa: The Rule is a sequel of the Internationally acclaimed film Pushpa: The Rise, which has set the fans on the edge of their seats for its release. It follows the life of its daring protagonist Pushpa Raj as played by Allu Arjun who is a smuggler by profession in the film....

movies.cast: Avnish Tiwary, Divya Dutta
movies.description: Sikandar Ka Muqaddar is a 2024 Indian Hindi-language film directed by Neeraj Pandey. The plot revolves around a cop who is mad about solving one of the robbery cases which remained unsolved. As the probe progresses ...

movies.cast: Abhisekh Bachchan, Ahilya Bamroo, Jayant Kriplani
movies.description: I Want to Talk is one of those relevant films that are intense, moving and meaningful directed by Shoojit Sircar. The cast features Indian actor Abhishek Bachchan in the central character's role who struggles with ...

movies.cast: Ajay Devgn, Bhoomika Chawla, Sameeera Reddy
movies.description: Naam is a thriller film surrounding the character Ajay Devgn which is Released in November 2024. The plot centres around an assassin who suffers memory loss after an accident. In the process of trying to regain his ...

movies.cast: Bhuvan Arora, Gaurav Venkatesh, Geetha Kailasam
movies.description: Amaran is an Indian Hindi-language war action film directed by Kamal Haasan which centers around Major Mukund Varadarajan.It traces the history of Major Varadarajan, who died during a terrorist operation in Kashmir. ...

movies.cast: Adil Hussain, Gulshan Devaiah, Janhvi Kapoor
movies.description: Ulajh (transl. Entangle) is a 2024 Indian Hindi Language spy thriller film directed by Sudhanshu Saria and produced by Junglee Pictures. The cast includes Janhvi Kapoor, Gulshan Devaiah, Roshan Mathew and Adil Hussain. It revolves around a young IFS officer having a family background of patriots who gets involved in perilous personal intrigue, during a professional posting that is a turning point in her career, but far from her country.

movies.cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Anna Ben
movies.description: Kalki 2898 AD is one of the most awaited Bollywood sci-fi films directed by Nag Ashwin. The story is set in the year 2898, where a band of rebels seeks to overthrow a totalitarian regime. In terms of the plot, the film is different from any other Indian film as it features renowned personalities like Prabhas, Deepika Padukone, Amitabh Bachchan, and Kamal Haasan.

movies.cast: Abhisekh Banerjee, Akshay Kumar
movies.description: Stree 2 is the horror comedy-drama film on the director Amar Kaushik which is released in India. This is a follow-up to the ’Stree’ movie which was released in the year 2018. The cast includes Rajkummar Rao, Shraddha Kapoor, Pankaj Tripathi, Aparshakti Khurana, and others, all of whom were there in the Stree movie as well.

movies.cast: Yash, Srinidhi Shetty
Ahmed Ibn Umar, Aman Rajput, Anil Kapoor
movies.description: Animal is a Bollywood action thriller film directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga. The film stars Ranbir Kapoor, Parineeti Chopra, Anil Kapoor, and Bobby Deol in the lead roles. The film is produced by Bhushan Kumar, Krishan Kumar, Murad Khetani, and Sandeep Reddy Vanga under the banner of T-Series and Cine1 Studios.

movies.directorName: Artemii Abramov, Evgeny Dostal, Franz Spilhaus
movies.cast: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Hrithik Roshan
movies.description: Tiger 3 is an Indian action thriller film which will be released soon focusing primarily on the life of RAW agent Tiger, played by Salman Khan. It lies third in the order of Tiger film series followed by the blockbusters Ek Tha Tiger and Tiger Zinda Hai.

movies.cast: Kartik Aryan, Tripti Dimri, Rajpal Yadav
movies.description: Anees Bazmee directed the Hindi horror-comedy film Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3. Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 is an Indian film which is the third part of the Bhool Bhulaiyaa series after the superhit Bhool Bhulaiyaa released in 2007 and Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2 launched in 2022.

movies.cast: Aileen Wu, Archee Renaux, Cailee Spaeny
movies.description: Alien: Romulus is  released in the year 2024 in Hindi, it is directed by Fede Álvarez and falls into the genre of sci-fi horror films. A group of young space settlers searching a found-abandoned space station & it’s airspace finds themselves facing a frighteningly powerful alien creature.

movies.movieName: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
movies.cast: Freya Allan, Kevin Durand, Owen Teague
movies.description: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes is a new American science fiction film, directed by Wes Ball. It is the continuation of the War for the Planet of the Apes, released in 2017, and the fifth film of the series made in order to reboot the Planet of the Apes. The action of the movie takes place a number of years after the War for the Planet of the Apes and centers on Caesar who is the chief of the apes’ community and works on suppressing a new human menace to his kind.

movies.cast: Brie Larson, Iman Vellani
movies.description: Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. However, unintended consequences see Carol shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe. When her duties send her to an anomalous wormhole linked to a Kree revolutionary, her powers become entangled with those of Jersey City super-fan Kamala Khan, aka Ms. Marvel, and Carol’s estranged niece, now S.A.B.E.R. astronaut Captain Monica Rambeau. Together, this unlikely trio must team up and learn to work in concert to save the universe as 'The Marvels.'

movies.cast: Jason Momoa as Arthur Curry / Aquaman, Patrick Wilson as Orm Marius
movies.description: In this sequel, Aquaman must forge an uneasy alliance with his imprisoned brother, Orm, to protect Atlantis and the world from irreversible destruction

movies.cast: Ryan Reynolds as Wade Wilson / Deadpool, Hugh Jackman as James "Logan" Howlett / Wolverine
movies.description: "Deadpool & Wolverine" is a 2024 superhero film produced by Marvel Studios, marking the first R-rated entry in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Directed by Shawn Levy, the film brings together Wade Wilson (Deadpool) and James "Logan" Howlett (Wolverine) in a high-stakes mission to protect the multiverse.

movies.cast: Chris Hemsworth as Tyler Rake, Golshifteh Farahani as Nik Khan
movies.description:
"Extraction 2" is a 2023 American action thriller film directed by Sam Hargrave and written by Joe Russo. It is a sequel to the 2020 film "Extraction" and is based on the graphic novel "Ciudad" by Ande Parks, Joe Russo, Anthony Russo, Fernando León González, and Eric Skillman. 
WIKIPEDIA

Plot Summary: After barely surviving his grievous wounds from his mission in Dhaka, Bangladesh, black-ops mercenary Tyler Rake returns for another dangerous mission. This time, he is tasked with rescuing the imprisoned family of a ruthless gangster.

movies.cast: Travis Fimmel as Anduin, Lothar Paula Patton as Garona
movies.description: "Warcraft" is a 2016 fantasy action film directed by Duncan Jones, based on the popular video game series by Blizzard Entertainment. The film explores the initial encounters between humans and orcs, focusing on the conflict that arises when the orc shaman Gul'dan opens a portal to the human realm of Azeroth.

movies.cast: Letitia Wright as Shuri, Lupita Nyong'o as Nakia
movies.description: "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever" is a 2022 superhero film produced by Marvel Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures. It serves as a sequel to the 2018 film "Black Panther" and is part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The film is directed by Ryan Coogler, who also co-wrote the screenplay with Joe Robert Cole.

movies.cast: Suriya as Kanguva / Francis Theodore, Bobby Deol, Disha Patani
movies.description: "Kanguva" is a 2024 Indian Tamil-language epic fantasy action film directed by Siva and produced by Studio Green in collaboration with UV Creations. The film stars Suriya in dual roles, alongside Bobby Deol and Disha Patani, marking the Tamil debut for both Deol and Patani.

movies.cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr. as Devara / Vara, Janhvi Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan, Prakash Raj as Singappa
movies.description: "Devara: Part 1" is a 2024 Indian Telugu-language epic action film directed by Koratala Siva. The film features N.T. Rama Rao Jr. (Jr NTR) in a dual role as Devara and his son, Vara, alongside Janhvi Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan.

movies.cast: Thalapathy Vijay as Gandhi
movies.description: "The Greatest of All Time" is a 2024 Indian Tamil-language spy action thriller directed by Venkat Prabhu, featuring Thalapathy Vijay in multiple roles.

movies.cast: Samantha Ruth Prabhu as Yashoda, Unni Mukundan as Dr. Gautham, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar as Madhubala, Murali Sharma as Police Commissioner, Balram Rao Ramesh as Central Minister Giridhar
movies.description: "Yashoda" is a 2022 Indian Telugu-language action thriller film written and directed by the duo Hari–Harish. The movie stars Samantha Ruth Prabhu in the titular role, alongside Unni Mukundan and Varalaxmi Sarathkumar.

movies.cast: Kamal Haasan as Senapathy Siddharth as Chitra Aravindhan Kajal Aggarwa
movies.description: "Hindustani 2", also known as "Indian 2", is a 2024 Indian action thriller film directed by S. Shankar. This sequel to the 1996 film "Hindustani" (titled "Indian" in Tamil) features Kamal Haasan reprising his role as Senapathy, an ex-freedom fighter turned vigilante combating corruption.

movies.cast: Prabhas as Deva Prithviraj, Sukumaran as Varadha, Shruti Haasan
movies.description: "Salaar: Part 1 – Ceasefire" is a 2023 Indian Telugu-language epic dystopian action thriller directed by Prashanth Neel, featuring Prabhas in the titular role.

movies.cast: N. T. Rama Rao Jr. as Komaram Bheem, Ram Charan as Alluri Sitarama Raju, Alia Bhatt as Sita ,Ajay Devgn in a pivotal role
movies.description: "RRR" is a 2022 Indian Telugu-language epic action drama directed by S. S. Rajamouli, renowned for his work on the "Baahubali" series. The film is set in the 1920s and presents a fictionalized account of two Indian revolutionaries, Alluri Sitarama Raju and Komaram Bheem, who fought against British colonialists and the Nizam of Hyderabad.

movies.cast: Diljit Dosanjh as Fateh Singh, Neeru Bajwa as Senior Constable ,Pooja Singh, Jasmin Bajwa, Rana Ranbir as Shampy, B.N. Sharma as Shampy’s Dad, Nasir Chinyoti
movies.description: "Jatt & Juliet 3" is a 2024 Indian Punjabi-language romantic comedy directed by Jagdeep Sidhu, featuring Diljit Dosanjh and Neeru Bajwa reprising their roles as Fateh Singh and Pooja Singh, respectively

movies.cast: Gippy Grewal as Gurmail Singh, Tanu Grewal as Beant Kau,r Karamjit Anmol as Semma, Raj Dhaliwal as Chinndo
movies.description: "Yaar Mera Titliaan Warga" is a 2022 Indian Punjabi-language romantic comedy film directed by Vikas Vashisht. The movie stars Gippy Grewal as Gurmail Singh and Tanu Grewal as Beant Kaur, a married couple experiencing a lull in their relationship. To rekindle their romance, they create fake Facebook accounts, leading to humorous and emotional situations.
